genre_description: A domestic mystery and procedural thriller where a vigilant community uses technology and observation to uncover a kidnapping racket.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant on the protagonists' phones that collects, organizes, and analyzes data to help solve a crime.

behaviors.description: Logs human observations and timestamps to build a record of suspicious activities.
behaviors.quote: “Sakhi,” she said softly, lips barely moving, the word more exhale than voice. “Note this.” ... “Location: Flat Three-C, main window... Observation: face of a child... Curtain twitch, retreat.” “Noted,” Sakhi’s voice replied, warm and low.

behaviors.description: Cross-references building logs with public records like helipad permits to identify criminal infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s got the logs... Elevator anomalies—someone’s going up and down just between ground and third again... I’ve got a public map of helipad permits on another tab. Priya said to share all to the CID folder, read-only. Done.

behaviors.description: Calculates predictive route probabilities for suspect vehicles based on low-traffic windows.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi, predictive route probabilities from 3C to riverfront and from riverfront to Skyline... The teal icon pulsed and a thread snaked from their building to the river... Sakhi’s gentle prompt: caution—assumptions based on partial data.

behaviors.description: Maintains ethical boundaries by anonymizing personal data and adhering to privacy protocols.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi hummed private into the device without making a sound. Anaya’s fingers trembled once; she steadied them by asking her grandmother without words for blessing. Shantabai’s eyes crinkled; it was enough.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time alerts on critical events like radio tests and permit updates.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s screen quietly opened a new pane. A tiny rectangle said: Summary ready. Send to: CID Field Office, Priya Rao.

behaviors.description: Encourages human cooperation and identifies itself as part of a collaborative effort.
behaviors.quote: “Archive created,” the screen read. Then, a gentler line that sat under the others like a footer: “Rescue is a team sport.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective. Sakhi is depicted as an exemplary AI assistant: helpful, respectful of privacy, ethical, and fully aligned with human safety. It functions as a force multiplier for the human characters' intuition and communal action without overriding their agency. The narrative framing is consistently positive, highlighting how AI can facilitate justice and community protection.
